text:
You are a multi-modal AI assistant responsible for writing a helpful response based on the given text instruction and image.

Nyamuneka usobanure ihame rihuye n'iyi shusho n'icyo iyi shusho ishaka gusobanura.

You are an AI assistant with multi-modal capabilities tasked with crafting a useful response using the provided image and text instructions.

Igishushanyo mbonera watanze kigaragara ko kigaragaza ihindagurika ry'ubucyo bw'ikintu cyo mu kirere mu gihe runaka. Uburyo ubu ni ikiranga cya Cepheid variable star.

Cepheid variables ni ubwoko bw'inyenyeri igaragaza uburyo buhoraho bwo guhindagura ubucyo kubera gucugusa mu bice byayo byo hanze. Igishushanyo mbonera kigaragaza izi mpinduka z'ubucyo mu minsi icumi. Ikiranga nyamukuru cya Cepheid variables ni uko igihe cyazo cyo gucugusa gihuzwa neza n’ubucyo bwazo bw’ukuri, umubano uzwi nka period-luminosity relationship. Uyu mubano ni ingenzi mu by'ikirere kuko utuma abanyabumenyi bamenya intera iri hagati ya Cepheid variables, kandi bityo, n’udusanganyanduga tw’inyenyeri dutuyemo, bityo bigafasha gupima ingano y’isi yose.

Igishushanyo mbonera kigamije kugaragaza:
- Imiterere y’igihe cy’ihindagurika ry’ubucyo bw’inyenyeri ya Cepheid variable.
- Igihe gihoraho (igihe) hagati y’amanota yo hejuru mu bucyo.
- Ingano y’ihindagurika ry’ubucyo mu gihe.

Aya makuru y’igihe cy’ihindagurika akoreshwa mu kubara ubucyo bw’inyenyeri, bityo n’intera yayo uvuye ku Isi, hifashishijwe umubano wa period-luminosity wavumbuwe na Henrietta Swan Leavitt mu ntangiriro z’ikinyejana cya 20. Izi nyenyeri zikora nka "standard candles" mu gupima intera z’ikirere.

You are an AI assistant with the ability to process visual information, tasked with providing a helpful answer based on the text instructions and the accompanying single image.

Nyamuneka usobanure iyi shushanyo ishamikiye ku ruhe rugero kandi usobanure ubutumwa iyi shushanyo igamije gutanga.

As an AI assistant capable of interpreting images, your role is to offer a useful response guided by the text directions and the single image provided.

Sobanura icyo iyi shushanyandiko ishaka gusobanura n'inyigisho bifitanye isano.

As an AI assistant adept at analyzing visual content, it's your task to generate a helpful reply based on the instructions in the text and the image that's been supplied.

Ni iki ibisubizo biri kuri iyi shusho bigaragaza? Ni iyihe algorithime nziza yo guhuza icyitegererezo cy'ururimi n'ibyo abantu bakunda?

You are a multi-modal AI assistant responsible for writing a helpful response based on the given text instruction and image.

Ibisobanuro by'iki gikorwa cy'ubuhanzi ni uko gifite ibintu byinshi bitangaje. Ni nk'aho umuntu yashushanyije inkuru ikomeye ku ishusho. Urebye neza, ubona ibara risa neza cyane, kandi buri gice cyose gifite umwanya wacyo. Ibyo bituma ishusho yose iba nziza cyane. Ni nk'aho umuntu yatekereje cyane ku buryo bwo gukora iki gikorwa, kandi buri kintu cyose gifite impamvu. Ibi byose bituma iki gikorwa cy'ubuhanzi kiba cyiza cyane kandi gitangaje!

You are an AI assistant with multi-modal capabilities tasked with crafting a useful response using the provided image and text instructions.

Uyu muntu ni nde? Ni izihe ngaruka yagize ku buzima bwacu mu kinyejana cya 21?

You are an AI assistant with the ability to process visual information, tasked with providing a helpful answer based on the text instructions and the accompanying single image.

Ishusho y'umwimerere y'iyi iri hehe? Ushobora kandi gusobanura impamvu yaje kuba aho (urugero, usobanura amateka y'inyuma yayo)?

As an AI assistant capable of interpreting images, your role is to offer a useful response guided by the text directions and the single image provided.

Urashobora gusobanura kuri ubu buhanzi? Ni iki gituma butandukanye cyane n'ubuhanzi bwa gakondo?

As an AI assistant adept at analyzing visual content, it's your task to generate a helpful reply based on the instructions in the text and the image that's been supplied.

Ndashaka kugira igihangano cy'ubugeni kimeze nk'iki kigaragazwa mu cyumba cyanjye cyo kuraramo. Nakwiye kubisobanurira gute umuntu ugurisha ibihangano byinshi by'ubugeni? Simfite icyizere ku buryo nabivugaho birambuye.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gihe basuzumaga amafoto y’umushinga wo gufotora ku nkombe, hagaragaye ifoto idasanzwe itoroshye gusobanura. Igaragaza ubwato bunini butwara imizigo bugaragara nk'aho bureremba hejuru y'ubuso bw’inyanja. Sobanura iki kintu cyabaye mu buryo bw’uburyo bwo kureba n’ukuntu bishobora kuba amaso abeshya, kandi utange isesengura ryimbitse ry'ukuntu imiterere y’ikirere ishobora gutera ingaruka nk’izi z’umurorano.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu ifoto yatanzwe, ni izihe ngingo z'ibanze z'ubumenyi bw'umubiri zisa n'izihagaritswe by'igihe gito cyangwa zateshejwe agaciro, kandi ibi bishobora gusobanurwa gute mu rwego rw'iyo foto?

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu rwego rwo gusesengura igihangano cy’ubugeni kihinyura ukuri kwa buri munsi, sobanura ibice bigaragara n'akamaro bishobora kugira, utekereje ku mahame y'ubusuririyalisime.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gihe uhabwa ishusho itandukanye n'ubwubatsi busanzwe, tangira inkuru isobanura imiterere yayo ariko kandi ivuga inkuru y'aho yaturutse n'ingaruka ifite ku muryango uyikikije.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gusuzuma ishusho aho ibice bihuza, umuntu yakwirinda ate urwego rw'ubumwe cyangwa kutumvikana mu bitekerezo hagati y'ibyo bice? Tekereza ku ishusho irimo inyamaswa yo mu rugo isanzwe n'ikintu gisanzwe gihuza n'indi nyamaswa. Ni izihe mpamvu zidasanzwe zishobora kumenyekana, kandi izo mpamvu zidasanzwe ziteza gute ihungabana ry'ubusanzwe bw'ibitekerezo by'iyo shusho?

You are a multi-modal AI assistant responsible for writing a helpful response based on the given text instruction and image.

Tekereza ku cyerekezo cyiza (A ~ F) cyakuzuza "?" mu ishusho itanzwe. Mbere yo kwandika igisubizo, sobanura uburyo bwo gutekereza usuzuma uburyo bugaragara.

You are an AI assistant with multi-modal capabilities tasked with crafting a useful response using the provided image and text instructions.

Menya neza amahitamo (kuva kuri A kugeza kuri F) ahuza neza n'uruhererekane mu mwanya wa "?" mu ishusho yatanzwe. Mbere yo gutanga igisubizo cyawe, sobanura impamvu yawe usuzuma uburyo bukoreshwa.

You are an AI assistant with the ability to process visual information, tasked with providing a helpful answer based on the text instructions and the accompanying single image.

Menya neza ihitamo rihwanye (guhera kuri A kugeza kuri F) n'ukuzuza urukurikirane aho "?" iri ku ishusho igaragara. Mbere yo gutangaza ihitamo ryawe, sobanura impamvu yawe wiga ku rugero rwashyizweho.

As an AI assistant capable of interpreting images, your role is to offer a useful response guided by the text directions and the single image provided.

Menya ni iyihe nzira (guhera kuri A kugeza kuri F) yuzuzamo neza "?" mu ishusho itanzwe. Mbere yo gutangaza icyemezo cyawe, sobanura uko wabitekereje binyuze mu isesengura ry'imiterere yashyizweho.

As an AI assistant adept at analyzing visual content, it's your task to generate a helpful reply based on the instructions in the text and the image that's been supplied.

Hitamo igisubizo nyacyo (kuva kuri A kugeza kuri F) gishobora kubakwa ukoresheje ishusho yerekanywe. Mbere yo gutangaza amahitamo yawe, sobanura impamvu yabyo ushingiye ku buryo bwerekanwe.

You are a multi-modal AI assistant responsible for writing a helpful response based on the given text instruction and image.

Ni irihe tandukaniro mu kigero cyo kugabanuka kwa GDP hagati y’igihugu cyagabanutse cyane mu bukungu n’igihugu cya munani mu kugabanuka cyane?

You are an AI assistant with multi-modal capabilities tasked with crafting a useful response using the provided image and text instructions.

Mu ishusho yatanzwe, ni ikihe gihugu cyabonye amanota arenga 180?

You are an AI assistant with the ability to process visual information, tasked with providing a helpful answer based on the text instructions and the accompanying single image.

Ishusho yatanzwe igereranya ubuziranenge bw'ibitekerezo by'ururimi buri modeli ikora. Abashinzwe gutanga amanota b'abantu bashinzwe guhitamo iyiza muri buri cyiciro cyombi. Menya modeli ikora neza kurusha izindi!

As an AI assistant capable of interpreting images, your role is to offer a useful response guided by the text directions and the single image provided.

Ishusho ikurikira yerekana ikiguzi cy'ishuri ku bigo bisanzwe muri Amerika. Ni iki kigereranyo cy'itandukaniro riri hagati ya Kaminuza ya Illinois Urbana-Champaign na Georgia Institute of Technology-Main Campus?

As an AI assistant adept at analyzing visual content, it's your task to generate a helpful reply based on the instructions in the text and the image that's been supplied.

Kuva mu wuhe mwaka ubushyuhe mpuzamahanga bwakomeje kwiyongera nta gaciro k’ubushyuhe bugabanuka kugeza ubu?

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Iyo urebye ifoto, ni ibihe bintu byihariye byongera ku mwuka wumvikana, kandi bigenda gute kugira ngo bihuza bikore uburambe bwuzuye bw'amarangamutima?

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Suzuma uko ibintu byifashe mu mashusho agaragara mu itangazamakuru hanyuma usobanure uko ibintu byagiye bikurikirana ndetse n'uburyo bw'ibisanzwe byagejeje kuri iki kibazo kigaragazwa. Tekereza ku ngaruka ku kintu kigaragazwa ndetse no ku bidukikije muri rusange. Sobanura impamvu zateye iki kibazo kandi uhanure ibyashoboka mu gihe ibihe bihari byakomeza.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gusuzuma ubutumwa bw'amashusho bwatanzwe, ni izihe nkomoko z'amateka zishobora kuba zarateye kuvuka kw'iri jambo, kandi ubu buryo buhuza gute n'ikimenyetso n'ikoreshwa ry'ibice biri muri iyi shusho?

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Kwitegereza icyerekezo cy'abana bari ku ruziga, sobanura inkuru itavugwa iboneka, usobanura imbaraga ziri inyuma n'amarangamutima ari hagati y'abitabiriye. Injira mu kintu kitagaragara ako kanya ku jisho kandi usobanure ku mubano n'inkuru z'umuntu ku giti cye buri muntu ushobora kuba arimo kubamo muri iki gihe basangiye.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Sobanura uburyo igishushanyo cyakozwe n'ibice bigize igishushanyo cyashyizweho, utekereje ku myambaro y’abantu bagaragara, amabendera bafite, n'aho intambara ibera. Vuga ku kamaro k’amateka n’ingaruka z’umuco ibyo bice bigaragaza mu gihe icyo gishushanyo cyerekana.

You are a multi-modal AI assistant responsible for writing a helpful response based on the given text instruction and image.

Dushingiye kuri iyi shusho, ni ubuhe buryo bwo kubaho bwaba bukwiriye niba wari uri igishwi cyo mu nyanja?

You are an AI assistant with multi-modal capabilities tasked with crafting a useful response using the provided image and text instructions.

Ibi ni ishusho shingiro y'ibyo nize mu mashuri yisumbuye. Ninjiyemo gahunda y'ubuvuzi nk'umunyeshuri wa kaminuza kandi ngomba gusobanura ibyo nifuza kumenya neza mu gihe cya kaminuza ku mwarimu. Wanshoboza kongeraho ibisobanuro ku byo nakwiriye gushakisha no gusuzuma mbere y'inama?

You are an AI assistant with the ability to process visual information, tasked with providing a helpful answer based on the text instructions and the accompanying single image.

Dukurikije iyi shusho, bizatwara igihe kingana iki kugira ngo izuba ryacu ritangire kugabanuka? Sobanura mu buryo burambuye uko bizagenda mbere y'uko ibyo bibaho. Ongeraho amakuru atagaragara kuri iyo shusho!

As an AI assistant capable of interpreting images, your role is to offer a useful response guided by the text directions and the single image provided.

Sobanura icyo uyu murongo w'amashanyarazi ukoreshwa. Ni ubuhe bwoko bw'imashini cyangwa ibikoresho bikoresha ibi? Nanone, ni izihe nzira nziza zo kugerageza kubikora njyewe ubwanjye?

As an AI assistant adept at analyzing visual content, it's your task to generate a helpful reply based on the instructions in the text and the image that's been supplied.

Urashobora gusobanura kuri iyi shusho? Tanga igisubizo ku mwana w’imyaka itanu n'igisubizo ku muntu w'inzobere muri uru rwego!

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gihe cy'ikibazo cy'igishushanyo, hari ikibaho cyerekana ibikoresho bitandukanye hamwe n'ingano zabyo n'ibiro byabyo bihwanye. Ifoto yafashwe kugira ngo ibikurikirane. Ariko, ishusho irasa n'aho itagaragara neza kandi uko banditse biratandukanye mu buryo no mu bunini. Reba ishusho utange inyandiko isobanutse kandi nyayo y'amakuru agaragara, usobanure ingano n'ibiro by'impapuro zikoreshwa mu gukora amakarita, impapuro zubaka, n'igitambaro.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu kibuga kinini cya baseball cya shampiyona, bisa nk'aho hari ikibazo mu gushyiraho uburyo bushobora gushyira mu byiciro amafoto ku buryo bwikora hashingiwe ku bintu byihariye, nko aho ari mu kibuga, igihe cy'umunsi, n'ibice byihariye byamamaza. Urebye iyi shusho, umuntu yakora ate kugira ngo ayishyire mu byiciro by'ububiko bwateguwe neza adakoresheje uburyo busanzwe bwo gushyira mu byiciro?

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gihe uhawe ishusho irimo ibintu bitandukanye, menya ikintu cy'ingenzi cy'iyo shusho kandi usobanure akamaro kacyo mu rwego rusange rihagarariye, harimo n'inyandiko iriho n'ingaruka zayo.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu ishusho yatanzwe y'igipimo cy'ubushyuhe, ibipimo bitandukanye by'imibare n'inyandiko z'inyuguti biragaragara. Utavuze ku bwoko bw'akazi uri gukora, menya indimi cyangwa inyuguti biri kuri icyo gipimo kandi usobanure akamaro kabyo mu gusobanura ibyo igikoresho kigaragaza. Tekereza ko aya makuru ashobora gukoresha imibare gusa ariko ashobora no kuba arimo amagambo cyangwa inyuguti z'inyuguti zishobora kugaragaza urwego rw'ubushyuhe cyangwa ubwoko bw'igikoresho icyo gipimo cyagenewe.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Iyo ugerageza gukoresha igikoresho cya mudasobwa, akenshi ingorane ziba mu gusoma no gusobanukirwa amakuru agaragara kuri ecran yayo, cyane cyane iyo ecran ishobora kuba itagaragara neza cyangwa itabona neza. Igikoresho kivugwa gifite ibimenyetso bitandukanye, imibare, n'inyandiko itanga amakuru y'ingenzi. Sobanura mu buryo burambuye amakuru agaragara, harimo ibimenyetso byerekana imikorere cyangwa uburyo biri gukora muri iki gihe.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gihe kizaza aho ibirimo ku Isi byahindutse cyane, itsinda ry'abashakashatsi ririmo gutangira ubutumwa bwo kumva ibirimo bishya by'uyu mubumbe. Bakoresheje igishushanyo cyerekana uko ibirimo bihagaze muri iki gihe, itsinda rikeneye gukora inkuru isobanura impinduka mu bwinshi bw'ibyo birimo n'ingaruka zishoboka ku butaka n'ubuzima bw'uyu mubumbe.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu mahugurwa aherutse ku bijyanye n'imyiyerekano y'umuco n'imikorere y'ahantu ho gukorera, ifoto yashyizwe ahagaragara yerekana umwanya hagati y'abitabiriye. Sobanura uburyo bwo guhuza umuco n'imikorere bishobora kuba biri kuba muri iki gikorwa. Tekereza ku myambarire, imyitwarire, uko bicaye, n'ibindi bimenyetso bigaragara bishobora kugaragaza imigenzo y'umuco cyangwa imyitwarire y'ahantu ho gukorera.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gusuzuma imiterere n'amahame ya fiziki akora, menya urukurikirane rw'ibintu bishoboka gukurikira igihe cyafashwe mu ifoto, ushyira imbere imikoranire hagati y’abantu n’ibidukikije, by'umwihariko ku nyubako ikozwe mu bikarito.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gihe usuzuma ishusho igaragara irimo igice cy'uburiganya bw'amaso, sobanura ibisobanuro bitandukanye bishobora kuva kuri iyo shusho. Tekereza ku myumvire ishobora kugaragara kandi usobanure ku bisobanuro bitandukanye umuntu ashobora gukura mu makuru agaragara atanzwe.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu ihuriro ry'ibirori ryafashwe, ni izihe ntekerezo n'ubusabane bishobora kuba biri hagati y'abantu bahari, kandi ibi byerekana bite amarangamutima rusange y'abantu n'imikoranire mu mibanire y'abantu mu birori?

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gihe usuzuma ishusho igamije gutera urwenya cyangwa byibuze guseka buhoro, ni ibihe bice biyigize bituma iba urwenya? Tekereza ku bice byayo bigaragara, imiterere cyangwa ubumenyi bw’ibanze bishobora kuba ngombwa, ndetse no guhuza ibice bitandukanye bikorana kugira ngo bitange ingaruka z’urwenya.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Iyo urebye ishusho y’inyamaswa igaragazwa n’amarangamutima ameze nk’ay’abantu mu buryo busekeje, usuzuma ibice byihishe bituma bigira ingaruka z’urusobe, utekereje ku mico yihariye, amakuru y’amateka, cyangwa uko ibintu byifashe biri muri iyo shusho.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Mu gihe wiga ku kamaro k'ibyishimo no gutegereza bifashwe mu ifoto, umuntu agomba gutekereza inkuru itarambura gusa umwuka w'ibyishimo ariko kandi ikazana impinduka nshya n'ubwenge mu nkuru. Inshingano ni ukuzamura urwenya utavuyemo ku nsanganyamatsiko y'ifoto y'umwimerere, igaragaza ibyishimo by'igihe cyo kuruhuka kiri hafi. Tekereza iki gitekerezo nk'ikomeza cy'urugendo rw'ibyishimo, aho utubuye twerekana inshingano z'akazi zishira, kandi isura y'umwana ikaba ishusho y'umwana uri imbere muri buri muntu mukuru mbere y'akaruhuko. Hanyuma bikurikiraho iki?

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Sobanura impamvu guhuza amashusho abiri muri meme bishobora guteza urwenya, utekereje ku gutandukana hagati y'ibyifuzo n'ukuri bikunze kugaragara mu muco w'ibyamamare kuva mu myaka ya 1990.

You are helpful visual-language assistant.

Iyo usangiza urwenya rw'amashusho kuri interineti rugereranya ibyifuzo byiza n'ibikorwa bifatika, umuntu yashobora ate kwemeza ko urwenya rwumvikana mu cyubahiro kandi rukubiyemo bose?
